title: DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_OPEN_RATIO
content:
0xB6E6FBA95C7324AC0x34883DE3// DoorSystemSetOpenRatio
void DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_OPEN_RATIO(Hash doorHash, float ajar, BOOL requestDoor, BOOL forceUpdate);Parameters:doorHash: Door system identifierajar: requestDoor: forceUpdate: On true invokes DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_DOOR_STATE; otherwise requestDoor is unused.Sets the ajar angle of a door.
Ranges from -1.0 to 1.0, and 0.0 is closed / default.
Old name:  _SET_DOOR_AJAR_ANGLE
codeBlocks:
// DoorSystemSetOpenRatio
void DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_OPEN_RATIO(Hash doorHash, float ajar, BOOL requestDoor, BOOL forceUpdate);

Sets the ajar angle of a door.
Ranges from -1.0 to 1.0, and 0.0 is closed / default.
